title: 'Correlation Queen number and rates of evolution'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(boot)
library(pgirmess)

x = read.table("Correlations-traits.txt",header=T)
attach(x)
names(x)
```

## Visual inspection

```{r}

ggplot(data=x,aes(x=log(Exp),y=dnds, color=factor(Polygyny))) + geom_point(alpha = 0.2)+geom_smooth(method="lm", se = FALSE)+theme_bw() + xlab("Log(Expression)") + ylab("Log(dnds)")+scale_y_log10()+ylim(0,.5)

ggplot(data=x,aes(x=log(total),y=dnds, color=factor(Polygyny))) + geom_point(alpha = 0.2) + geom_smooth(method="lm",se = FALSE)+theme_bw()+ xlab("Log(Connectivity)") + ylab("Log(dnds)")+scale_y_log10()+ylim(0,.5)

ggplot(data=x,aes(x=log(Exp),y=dnds))+geom_point(alpha=.1)+theme_bw()+facet_grid(.~Polygyny) + xlab("Log(Expression)") + ylab("Log(dnds)")+scale_y_log10()+ylim(0,.5)+geom_smooth(se=FALSE,method="lm")

ggplot(data = x, aes(x = factor(Polygyny), y = Exp)) + geom_boxplot(notch = TRUE) +theme_bw() +scale_y_log10() + theme_bw() + ylab("Expression log")

ggplot(data = x, aes(x = factor(Polygyny), y = Exp)) + geom_violin() +theme_bw() +scale_y_log10() + theme_bw() + ylab("Expression log")+stat_summary(fun.data="mean_cl_boot",geom="errorbar",width=.1,color="red")

ggplot(data = x, aes(x = factor(Polygyny), y = total)) + geom_boxplot(notch = TRUE) +theme_bw() +scale_y_log10() + theme_bw() + ylab("Connectivity log")

ggplot(data = x, aes(x = factor(Polygyny), y = total)) + geom_violin() +theme_bw() +scale_y_log10() + theme_bw() + ylab("Connectivity log")+stat_summary(fun.data="mean_cl_boot",geom="errorbar",width=.1,color="red")

ggplot(data = x, aes(x = factor(Polygyny), y = dnds)) + geom_violin() +theme_bw() +scale_y_log10() + theme_bw() + ylab("dnds")+stat_summary(fun.data="mean_cl_boot",geom="errorbar",width=.1,color="red")+ylim(.1,.7)

```

# 1) dnds
```{r}
#First test
kruskalmc(dnds~factor(Polygyny),data=x)

bmean <- function(d, i){ return(mean(d[i]))}
boot.ci(boot(subset(x,Polygyny=="Mono")$dnds,statistic=bmean,R=1000),type="basic")
boot.ci(boot(subset(x,Polygyny=="Poly")$dnds,statistic=bmean,R=1000),type="basic")
boot.ci(boot(subset(x,Polygyny=="Not")$dnds,statistic=bmean,R=1000),type="basic")

#glm
# Contrast Multiple queens
contrasts(x$Polygyny) <- contr.treatment(levels(x$Polygyny),base=3)
contrasts(x$Polygyny)
form1 = log(dnds)  ~ Polygyny
rate.lm <- glm(formula = form1,data=x)
summary(rate.lm)
lmfit <- function(formula,data, indices) {
  d<-data[indices, ]
  fit <- (lm(formula, data = d))
  return(coef(fit))
}

results <- boot(data = x, statistic = lmfit, R = 1000, formula = form1)
for (i in 2:length(rate.lm$coefficients)) {
  bci <- boot.ci(results, type = "basic", index = i)
  print(sprintf("%s,%.4f,%.4f,%.4f", names(rate.lm$coefficients)[i], results$t0[i],
                bci$basic[4], bci$basic[5]))
}
twosidep<-function(data){
  p1<-sum(data>0)/length(data)
  p2<-sum(data<0)/length(data)
  p<-min(p1,p2)*2
  print(p)
}
twosidep(results$t[,2])
twosidep(results$t[,3])

# Change contrast to single queen
contrasts(x$Polygyny) <- contr.treatment(levels(x$Polygyny),base=1)
contrasts(x$Polygyny)
form1 = log(dnds)  ~ Polygyny
rate.lm <- glm(formula = form1,data=x)
summary(rate.lm)
lmfit <- function(formula,data, indices) {
  d<-data[indices, ]
  fit <- (lm(formula, data = d))
  return(coef(fit))
}

results <- boot(data = x, statistic = lmfit, R = 1000, formula = form1)
for (i in 2:length(rate.lm$coefficients)) {
  bci <- boot.ci(results, type = "basic", index = i)
  print(sprintf("%s,%.4f,%.4f,%.4f", names(rate.lm$coefficients)[i], results$t0[i],
                bci$basic[4], bci$basic[5]))
}
twosidep<-function(data){
  p1<-sum(data>0)/length(data)
  p2<-sum(data<0)/length(data)
  p<-min(p1,p2)*2
  print(p)
}
twosidep(results$t[,2])
twosidep(results$t[,3])
```

# 4) Effects of network, expression level and number of queens on the rates of evolution
```{r}
# Contrast Multiple queens
contrasts(x$Polygyny) <- contr.treatment(levels(x$Polygyny),base=3)
contrasts(x$Polygyny)
form1 = log(dnds)~ log(total) * Polygyny + log(Exp) * Polygyny
rate.lm <- glm(formula = form1,data=x)
summary(rate.lm)
lmfit <- function(formula,data, indices) {
  d<-data[indices, ]
  fit <- (lm(formula, data = d))
  return(coef(fit))
}

results <- boot(data = x, statistic = lmfit, R = 1000, formula = form1)
for (i in 2:length(rate.lm$coefficients)) {
  bci <- boot.ci(results, type = "basic", index = i)
  print(sprintf("%s,%.4f,%.4f,%.4f", names(rate.lm$coefficients)[i], results$t0[i],
                bci$basic[4], bci$basic[5]))
}
twosidep<-function(data){
  p1<-sum(data>0)/length(data)
  p2<-sum(data<0)/length(data)
  p<-min(p1,p2)*2
  print(p)
}
twosidep(results$t[,2])
twosidep(results$t[,3])
twosidep(results$t[,4])
twosidep(results$t[,5])
twosidep(results$t[,6])
twosidep(results$t[,7])
twosidep(results$t[,8])
twosidep(results$t[,9])

# Change contrast to Single queen
contrasts(x$Polygyny) <- contr.treatment(levels(x$Polygyny),base=1)
contrasts(x$Polygyny)
form1 = log(dnds)~ log(total) * Polygyny + log(Exp) * Polygyny
rate.lm <- glm(formula = form1,data=x)
summary(rate.lm)

  fit <- (lm(formula, data = d))
  return(coef(fit))
}

for (i in 2:length(rate.lm$coefficients)) {
  bci <- boot.ci(results, type = "basic", index = i)
  print(sprintf("%s,%.4f,%.4f,%.4f", names(rate.lm$coefficients)[i], results$t0[i],
                bci$basic[4], bci$basic[5]))
}
twosidep<-function(data){
  p1<-sum(data>0)/length(data)
  p2<-sum(data<0)/length(data)
  p<-min(p1,p2)*2
  print(p)
}
twosidep(results$t[,2])
